amendment.description: To provide alternative minimum tax relief, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 5634 pursuant to the order of September 18, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 5634 pursuant to the order of September 18, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 42. Record Vote Number: 203.
Amendment SA 5634 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S9239-9241, S9246-9253, S9254-9255) To provide alternative minimum tax relief, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5634 proposed by Senator Conrad.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5634 pursuant to the order of September 18, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 42. Record Vote Number: 203.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5634 pursuant to the order of September 18, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 42. Record Vote Number: 203.
